name: Reverse Update September 2015
description:
Written by Ira V. Simon (priveting.tumblr.com)

Hi lovelies! I saw some people are having trouble reading the posts after the new Tumblr update. I have written a script that will fix that, at least to some extent. I'm no expert so if you see something's wrong please let me know and I'll try my best to fix it :3
